title: The Spectacular Week of Linda Murphy: Dancing Hero at 80
summary: 80-year-old Linda Murphy discovers her superpowers through dancing and exercise, using them to save her neighborhood from a mysterious threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Die 80-jährige Linda Murphy entdeckt ihre Superkräfte durch Tanzen und Sport und nutzt sie, um ihre Nachbarschaft im Laufe einer Woche vor einer mysteriösen Bedrohung zu retten.
summaryDutch: De 80-jarige Linda Murphy ontdekt haar superkrachten door te dansen en te oefenen, waarmee ze haar buurt redt van een mysterieuze dreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Linda Murphy, âgée de 80 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs en dansant et en faisant de l'exercice, les utilisant pour sauver son quartier d'une menace mystérieuse au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Linda feels energetic as she dances at the local community center, suddenly her steps begin to create small shockwaves.
The news of her 'dancing shockwaves' spreads, and she's both excited and nervous as the local news asks for an interview.
During her regular park jog, Linda discovers she can run at superhuman speed, helping someone retrieve a stolen purse.
A mysterious figure watches Linda from afar, plotting to harness her newfound powers for evil.
Linda decides to confront the mysterious figure after seeing them sneak around the community center.
Using her dancing and exercise, Linda outmaneuvers the villain, winning the heart of her community as a local hero.
While being celebrated, Linda dances joyfully, promising to use her powers to keep the neighborhood safe.

ending: In a whirl of grace and power, Linda Murphy proved that age is just a number when it comes to heroism.
moral: Never underestimate the power of passion and the spirit of the community.
